title: Sattviko Cream N Onion Millet Puffs 40 GM
name: sattviko-onion-millet-puffs
description: Sattviko's Cream N Onion Millet Puffs have high protein, vitamin, and mineral content along with the universally loved cream & onion flavor to it. This millet snack has jowar/sorghum and ragi/finger millet in it. It has 500 million CFU probiotics per serving with 0% preservatives.
ingredientsDesc: Jowar (Sorghum) (17%), Corn, Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Gram, Rice, Ragi (Finger Millet) (7%), Quinoa, Sugar, Milk Solids, Iodized Salt, Onion Powder, Maltodextrin, Black Pepper, Dehydrated Parsley, Acidity Regulator (INS 330, INS 270), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans – 500 million CFU per Serve), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Natural and Nature Identical Flavouring Substances Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Spanish Tomato Millet Puffs 20 GM
name: sattviko-spanish-tomato-millet-puffs
description: Sattviko's Spanish Tomato Millet Puff is a snack with high-protein, low-carbohydrates, lots of fiber, and the goodness of 12 Indian spices and herbs. The tangy Spanish tomato flavor adds rich flavor to this millet snack. It is a minimally processed snack with is made with 500 million CFU probiotics/serving, 0% preservatives, and 0% palm oil.
ingredientsDesc: Jowar, Ragi, Corn, Chickpea, Rice, Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Seasoning & Spices (Brown Sugar, Paprika, Tomato Powder, Onion Powder, Maltodextrin, Edible Common Salt, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Probiotics (Bacillus Coagulans) 500 million per serving, Natural & Nature Identical Flavouring Substances. Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Sattviko Instant Millet Meal Tangy Tomato 40 Grams
name: sattviko-instant-millet-meal-tangy-tomato
description: Sattviko Tangy Tomato Millet Meal includes the benefits of pearl millets, turmeric, fennel, fenugreek, and ginger, as well as 8 additional tasty spices and herbs. This high-fiber and high-protein millet meal comes together in less than 5 minutes and contains no preservatives or oil. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Pearl Millets, Sorghum, Maltodextrin, Iodised Salt, Garlic POwder, Sugar, Corrinder, Funugreek, Turmeric, Ginger, fennel, Red Chilly, Ricebran Oil, Dehydrated Vegetables, (Peas, Carrot,Onion), Rolled Oats, Curry Leaves, Vegetable Protein (Soy)

title: Sattviko Instant Upma 70 GM
name: sattviko-instant-upma
description: Rava upma is a popular meal in India and is cooked in almost every Indian home. Sattviko’s Instant Upma has desi ghee, vegetables, various Indian spices, and 100% sattvic nature. It’s a high-protein meal that takes less than 5 minutes to cook. It can be enjoyed post-yoga or as a meal replacement. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Semolina (Suji) (68%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Cashew, Ghee, Sugar, Salt, Dehyrdrated Vegetable (Onion, Garlic, Carrot, Peas) (3%), Split Bengal Gram, Split Black Gram, Mustard, Spices & Condiments, Chilli Powder, Curry Leaves, Nature Identical Flavouring Substances

title: Sattviko Instant Oatmeal Dal Makhani Flavour 70 GM
name: sattviko-instant-oatmeal-dal-makhani
description: This instant oatmeal is a hearty and nutritious meal that combines the wholesome goodness of rolled oats with the rich, creamy taste of traditional Dal Makhani. Perfect for a quick breakfast or a savory snack, it offers a delightful blend of lentils, spices, and buttery flavors in just minutes. Enjoy the comfort of authentic Indian cuisine with the added benefits of fiber-rich oats and butter. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Oats (70%), Black Lentils (6.5%), Dehydrated Vegetables (Tomato, Garlic), Butter (4.3%), Milk Solids, Clarified Butter (Ghee), Ginger, Edible Common Salt, Chilli, Spices & Condiments

title: Sattviko Instant Oatmeal Veggie Masala 70 GM
name: sattviko-instant-oatmeal-veggie-masala
description: The traditional instant oats recipe never matched the Indian taste palette. So, we formulated this Instant Oats Veggie Masala that takes no time to prepare, is rich in protein and fiber, has chia seeds for healthy fats, and Indian spice mix containing cardamom, ginger, turmeric, holy basil, ashwagandha, etc. to feed the Indian taste buds. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Rolled Oats, Dried Vegetables (Carrot, Green Peas), Maltodextrin, Chia Seeds, iodized Salt, Spices, and Condiments (Onion, turmeric, Pepper, Cumin, Garlic, Fenugreek, Clove, Nutmeg, Red Chilli), Sugar, Starch, Natual Flavouring Substances, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Flavour Enhancer (INS 627, INS 631), Wheat Fibre, Nature-identical flavoring substances

title: Sattviko Instant Oatmeal Banoffee Flavour 70 GM
name: sattviko-instant-oatmeal-banoffee
description: Sattviko Instant Oatmeal Banoffee Flavour is a fusion of creamy banana and caramel powder in this delicious, wholesome meal. These instant oats are perfect for a quick breakfast or a sweet snack, this nutritious oatmeal combines the classic banoffee pie flavors with the health benefits of fiber-rich oats. Ready in just minutes for a tasty and satisfying treat. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Oats (53%), Milk Solids, Sugar, Caramel Powder (Sugar, Liquid Glucose, Butter, Cocoa Powder, Salt, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii)) (9%), Dehydrated Banana (5%), Cashew, Date Powder, Cinnamon, Salt
